```java
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data \
    '{"query": "{ grid {maxSession, sessionCount } }"}' -s \
    http://localhost:4444/graphql
```

```java
WebDriver driver = new RemoteWebDriver("http://localhost:4444/",
        new ChromeOptions());
```

```java
docker network create grid ![1](assets/1.png)

docker run -d -p 4442-4444:4442-4444 --net grid \
    --name selenium-hub selenium/hub:4.0.0 ![2](assets/2.png)

docker run -d --net grid -e SE_EVENT_BUS_HOST=selenium-hub --shm-size="2g" \
    -e SE_EVENT_BUS_PUBLISH_PORT=4442  -e SE_EVENT_BUS_SUBSCRIBE_PORT=4443 \
    selenium/node-chrome:4.0.0 ![3](assets/3.png)

docker network rm grid ![4](assets/4.png)
```

```java
WebDriverManager wdm = WebDriverManager.firefoxdriver().browserInDocker(); ![1](assets/1.png)

WebDriverManager wdm = WebDriverManager.chromedriver().browserInDocker()
        .browserVersion("beta"); ![2](assets/2.png)

WebDriverManager wdm = WebDriverManager.chromedriver().browserInDocker()
        .enableVnc(); ![3](assets/3.png)

WebDriverManager wdm = WebDriverManager.chromedriver().browserInDocker()
        .enableRecording(); ![4](assets/4.png)
```
